title: Hotel Check-in
description: Practice checking in at a hotel front desk

lines.speaker: partner
lines.text: Good evening! Welcome to Grand Hotel. How may I help you?

lines.speaker: user
lines.text: Good evening. I have a reservation under the name Tanaka.

lines.speaker: partner
lines.text: Let me check... Yes, I found it. A single room for three nights, correct?

lines.speaker: partner
lines.text: May I see your ID or passport, please?

lines.speaker: partner
lines.text: Thank you. Would you prefer a room on a higher floor or lower floor?

lines.speaker: user
lines.text: A higher floor would be nice, if available.

lines.speaker: partner
lines.text: Perfect. I have a room on the 15th floor for you. Here's your key card.

lines.speaker: user
lines.text: Thank you. What time is breakfast served?

lines.speaker: partner
lines.text: Breakfast is from 7 to 10 AM in the restaurant on the second floor.

lines.speaker: user
lines.text: Great, thank you for your help.
